mapper.select: select t2.* from (select rownum seq ,t.* from (select m.mem_id id, m.name name, m.gender gender, m.reg_date regDate, m.ssn ssn, m.email email, m.profile_img profileImg, m.role role, m.phone phone, m.major_seq majorSeq from member m order by reg_date desc ) t ) t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc

select mem_id as id, pw as pw, name as name, gender as gender, reg_date as regDate, ssn as ssn, substrb(ssn,1,6) birth, email as email, profile_img as profileImg, phone as phone from member where ${option} = #{keyword}
select count(*) from member where mem_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update member set pw = #{pw}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} where mem_id = #{id}
